item.description:
The day of the event, I will need people to help run it.
We will need people to:


  • Take money at the gate
  • Direct airplanes
  • Keep the public in the proper areas
  • Help out at the FPA booth


Please come and bring any family members that can help out.

I hope everyone can atleast come to the show even if they can't help out, it should be a lot of fun!

Even if you can't make it for 7AM, please still come. The more people that show up the more time we can relieve members to spend time looking around the show.

When you get there Sunday, please check-in with Matt Scales at the FORD command trailer in the center of the field.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Wings and Wheels
